description: Array of all items and add/remove/select actions in a comparison.

ID.title: ID
ID.description: Identifier for the item included within a comparison.

removal.title: Removal
removal.description: Tracked when an item is removed from a comparison.

addition.title: Addition
addition.description: Tracked when an item is added to a comparison.

selected.title: Selected
selected.description: Tracked when an item is selected/clicked-through upon to view more details.
